name: Paintrail
description:
Oh no! 

Yikes! Saws and spikes in mountain cave? You ask why those are there? You should ask: can you get out?

Keyfeatures:

-You can move! Left, right and variable jump. That's all! Old school platformer.

-Short game! You can finish demolevel in less than minute, even faster if you focus! Explore, test, repeat! You can call this a minute platformer. Is this easy? Well, You will find it out!

-Score IS your timer! Faster you are, better is final score!

-Avoid spikes and traps! If you take damage, damage is added from score. If the score ends before finish, game over.

*Version 0.1 - demo

-One demo level

-Music (yes!)

-To be continued?

*Future plans:

-More levels

-More tweaks

-Lore and story

-Improvements for graphics and redesign
